lead_paragraph: Manchester City's top-of-the-table Premier League clash against Leicester City on Saturday and the game against third-placed Tottenham Hotspur the next weekend could be a "turning point", defender Bacary Sagna said in an interview published on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Sagna Looks Ahead to 'Turning Point' in Man City's Season
headline.main: Sagna Looks Ahead to 'Turning Point' in Man City's Season
